title: 为什么品葱现在全是恶俗圈的东西
contents:
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Test {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Scanner LZSC = new Scanner(System.in);

			System.out.println("Please enter the first set of numbers");

		float tempA = LZSC.nextFloat();

			System.out.println("Please enter the second set of numbers");

		float tempB = LZSC.nextFloat();



		float Value = tempA + tempB;

			if (Value == 114514) {

				System.out.println("Value is " + Value + "!" + "Great!Ryuzawa is TadokoroKoji");

				}

			else {

				System.out.println("Bad!Ryuzawa isn't TadokoroKoji!But Ryuzawa's mother is dead.");

			}

	}

}
